name: Gene Coder
description:
This is my submission to the 131st Trijam! In the jam, you are tasked with making a game in 3 hours, excluding time for planning/submitting. Because the theme was "Genetics", I made a game where you arrange parts of a genetic code against the clock, trying to correctly sequence as many as possible!

Controls:

Click and Drag. There is a translucent square where the pieces should go, you drag the piece there. After slotting in a piece it can not be removed, so be careful! The screenshots on the right show correct and incorrect combinations too if you are stuck.
